outputs.output_descr: Mainstreams peacebuilding and human security in development processes, capacitates key actors to prevent, manage and resolve conflict, and improves access of conflict-affected communities to basic services, increased income and participatory governance

project_descr: Policy and capacity building programme in support of the 2005-2011 UNDAF Outcome on the promotion of the Culture of Peace and human security
project_title: Conflict Prevention and Peace Building Programme
